website_summaries.verdict: This power bank comes at a significant value and boasts a compact design that is perfect for everyday use.
pros: Device is lightweight and compact, great to slip in a bag
cons: Doesn’t charge certain devices as fast as other models

customer_reviews.title: 7 days of my life
customer_reviews.text: I got this charger for backpacking and traveling. I have a inReach Mini, Fenis 5X plus, cell phone, head lamp, and aftershokz headphones that I need to charge while out. I did a 10 day trip shark fishing and have used it several days backpacking. I can charge everything nightly for 7 days before i run out of power. I'm totally amazed by how much power it retains. It charges fast and has ports for everything I need all at once. I've had several 10k chargers in the past. This charger is so much better for me and worth the weight.
customer_reviews.author: B. Andrews

customer_reviews.title: Great for phones, Not for Macbook Pro
customer_reviews.text: For the price and power it's definitely a great travel charger for phones and tablets. I had primarily bought this based off of reviews of others about it charging there surface pro, or to say the least at least keep it on. It will definitely keep your small laptop or heavier output device on but be mindful it's really for minimal use. I was editing photo and video while keeping it plugged in and it would hold the charge even for a good 30 minutes but would decrease little by little after that. It's about the size of an ipad mini. a little bit smaller but bigger than an iphone X Max or whatever the biggest iphone is out.
customer_reviews.author: DVVINCI

customer_reviews.title: Great Power Bank
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to see how this product held out for a bit before reviewing it. It's a very nice power bank. It's a bit bigger than I was expecting, but not too big. It has a nice weight to it, nice non slippery texture and it holds a charge. I haven't used it much but it held the initial full charge much longer than I thought it would. I have yet to charge more than two devises at a time with it (iPhone, iPad, or blue tooth earbuds), but there are ports to charge up to four devises at once. I don't think anyone would be disappointed with this bank.
customer_reviews.author: M's AmazonReviews

customer_reviews.title: Ok Power Bank, Crummy Cables and No Pass-Through Charging
customer_reviews.text: Nice and thin power bank. Was really satisfied with the out of box experience. The first few charges of my iPhone was perfect, then I noticed the phone wasn’t charging. Apparently the cables included with the power bank are REALLY cheap and I just threw them out because I had other cables. One HUGE drawback is there is no pass through charging feature which allows for the charging of the device and battery at the same time. So, all in all, for the price, I guess the product is okay but would be willing to pay a bit more for better cables and pass-through charging.
customer_reviews.author: Travel Pro

customer_reviews.title: Best Power Bank out there by far! Full PD charging for iPhone XS Max!
customer_reviews.text: Power delivery (USB C to Lightning) is faster than wall jacks! It even uses a single green light to indicate PD charging is underway. I have charged my iPhone XS Max three times and still show 3/4 charge remaining on power bank!! Lightning in along with micro and USB C ensure that no matter where you are, you'll be able to keep this bank ready to go. Best I've ever used. Hands down.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen M.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and quick charge
customer_reviews.text: This power bank is very high quality and packaged well. Comes with a case and extra cables. The power bank also came about 80% charged. I tested the output on my galaxy s8 and it is really quick charge. As you can see in my uploaded screenshot of my phone, it says fast charging on the bottom when using this power bank. It is definitely a big power bank and not very light. But you would expect that of a power bank with huge capacity. However it is slim and the case is useful if you want to take it somewhere. Overall I'm really satisfied with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome charger for mobile devices
customer_reviews.text: Great portable, fits nicely in bags/cases without a hitch, I prefer the flat style design vs the common tube/brick. It quite literally has all the ports I need and more plus fast charging; nice to know it has three methods of input for charging (microUSB, Lightning, and USB C). The cables they provide are CHARGING ONLY, they do not provide any data from what I have tried. Only complaint I can think of is I'd prefer the included charging cords were a tad bit longer but I understand that they're trying to minimize the total bulk of carrying around a portable charger.
customer_reviews.author: My Lord

customer_reviews.title: Super fast is best for sure
customer_reviews.text: This is the best power pack I have used yet. The speed and turn around charge is lightening fast. The reboot is just as fast. It’s a good size for travel in purse back pack or even pocket. Super lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Audre H

customer_reviews.title: Need extra power? Go big or go home.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to use as a reserve power supply for my iPad and for those rare instances that I don’t have wall current available. This think will run my iPad from dead all day. It’s got twice the capacity as the battery in my iPad. I can use it for everything but right now all I need it for is to keep my tablet going while playing games. Games really tear up your battery power. Overall I’m satisfied. Slim low profile package, lots of ports, lots of power. I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Calvin R. Stiff, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: does not work for Macbook pro
customer_reviews.text: Does not work for Macbook pro. I returned for a new one, and had the exact same issue. It will "hold the charge" (for instance, if Mac is at 65%, I can plug this charger in, and it will hold the 65% for a few hours) for a bit before dying out. When you hover over the battery logo on the mac, it shows the charging "Lightning bolt", however, reads "battery is not charging" even though the device is plugged in. Returned for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: LC

customer_reviews.title: Charges phone while using it!!!
customer_reviews.text: This battery is amazing and actually charges my Samsung note 9 while I'm using it. No other battery has ever been able to do this. My phone has a 4000mah battery. It also charges up relatively fast and I love the smooth feel of the outside. It is a bit heavy but you have to expect that for all the juice it's pumping out. So far extremely satisfied. Please just let it last.
customer_reviews.author: MW

customer_reviews.title: Almost Perfect
customer_reviews.text: It works as intended but I can't get anything to charge from the USB C port. Every time I plug something in, it thinks that that item is a power source and tries to charge the battery bank. I find myself bringing a traditional USB to USB C plug with me to charge my USB C items.
customer_reviews.author: sailorcolin

customer_reviews.title: Best Power Bank I  EVERRRR Used
customer_reviews.text: Will definitely purchase again. Charges devices quickly and many times on one charge. Recharges Quickly with USBC charger. This power bank can also be recharged with the iPhone lightening cable and it’s super fast! The coating however is not the best but it works well. UPDATE My charger stopped working like it used to so I contacted the seller. Dylan was very nice and offered me a replacement. I would still recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.author: Poison Ivy

customer_reviews.title: Good customer service on broken unit
customer_reviews.text: Ive revised this review after good customer service interaction with the charmast team. Original device lost power after several months and it was outside of amazons return window. Charmast replaced it for me without hassle. Worked for about 2months with great charging abilities and now will not charge any devices at all. Light blinks when plugged in and to wall to charge the bank, so I know It’s at full power. Nothing once connected to a device. Disappointed that it didn’t last!
customer_reviews.author: boozebunny

customer_reviews.title: Worked better than expected for a short period of time.
customer_reviews.text: This product worked flawlessly and better than expected for about 2 weeks. Then all of the sudden it stopped charging. Since I'm located overseas, exchanging it is not even a practical option, unless the manufacturer sends me a replacement. Sending it from Philippines will probably cost me more than buying a new one. Update: The manufacturer sent me a new one upon learning of this issue, and I just now got around to provide an update. So far the new unit is working flawlessly. I just hope this will last a few years before I run into another issue. Now that's customer service!
customer_reviews.author: John G.

customer_reviews.title: This powerbank is a beast.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this bank mainly for its battery size and for my tech travel needs. I also bought the Charmast 10,000mAH mini powerbank as an upgrade to my lipstick-sized powerbank that had served me well, but could only charge my iPhone 6S+ once before it was fully depleted. I am loving them both and while I have yet to take more than an overnight getaway that could drain this powerbank to zero.
customer_reviews.author: J. Lyles

customer_reviews.title: Really happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived very quickly after I ordered it. Both the packaging and the product are very sleek and stylish. There are suction cups which fix the charger to your phone which makes it very convenient and easy to travel with, as does the wireless feature which works seamlessly. It holds more than enough charge and is far superior to my previous portable chargers. The size and shape of it also match my phone perfectly so carrying it is not an issue and using the phone while charging is also very straightforward.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Mccusker

customer_reviews.title: Won’t charge for more than a few mins
customer_reviews.text: I bought this in January to prepare for upcoming trips. Because of covid, I ended up not taking those trips so never had a reason to use this until recently. The battery stops charging devices after only a few minutes. I have to repeatedly unplug and plug them back in to initiate charging again, and repeat every few mins. This happens for every device and cable combination I’ve tried. Skip this one and look for something that will actually work.
customer_reviews.author: amazon

customer_reviews.title: Light and thin!
customer_reviews.text: Finally a power bank that I can trust and bring to big road trips! Having a Nintendo Switch, a cellphone and a tablet always in use is not an easy task! I’m able to keep my devices always full and ready to go! I like how thin and light the battery is, It can fit everywhere!
customer_reviews.author: Edgar Gil

customer_reviews.title: Slim, reliable and has PD
customer_reviews.text: I have used this power bank for about half a year now and it is still going strong. This is the slimmest 26800 PD power bank that I have ever seen. It feels light compared to other power banks and can fit in my jean pockets but its better if you put it in a backpack. I highly recommend this power bank for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: Sunny Poon

customer_reviews.title: Must have powerbank at decent price
customer_reviews.text: I use pixel 4xl and was able to charge 5 times. I usually go to camping very often and this will help me and my friends to keep charge on our phones as it can charge 4 phones at a time. 26800 mAh powerbank is simply amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Suprim Upadhyay

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t charge well. I brought it to help with my computer and my phone and I’d rather just use the plug because I cannot count on this at all. That is quite unfortunate because I spent so much money on it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smooth and slim quick charger.
customer_reviews.text: Slim and lightweight with a strong casing and excellent quick charging capabilities for our smartphones and other peripheral devices. This is easy to keep on hand to ensure our phone batteries don't suddenly turn our phones off.
customer_reviews.author: Mickey

customer_reviews.title: Must have
customer_reviews.text: This is a must specially if you travel a lot with a family, it’s like our main charger to all devices. And it lasts for very very long time that we cant even remember when is that last time we charged it
customer_reviews.author: Sam Wisman

customer_reviews.title: Epic Powerbank
customer_reviews.text: Haven't used such a power bank before. It is best among all of which I had used. This has a significant battery life span which can charge your electronic device 5-6 times within a short time. Moreover, it has many ports to charge with a 3.0 port.
customer_reviews.author: ARJUN

customer_reviews.title: Love this charger
customer_reviews.text: My iPhone 6 battery is only working at 60% now that the phone is over 4 years old. I bought this because I don't have the time to send my iPhone to Apple for 3 to 5 days whilst a new battery is fitted. There is nothing wrong with the phone just a very poor battery. This battery charger is fabulous. I only charge it once a week and charge my iPhone off this at least 20 times a week
customer_reviews.author: Blake R Lovelady

customer_reviews.title: long lasting
customer_reviews.text: this charger is great its slick design and not too heavy..I love it wish i bought it before. i dont have a place to charge my phone at work so this is a great charger for me as i charge my phone and earphones all night and theres still juice left in the thing. has colors to indicate if its fully charged or time to charge.. because of its two usb ports makes my life easier when the kids want to charge there phones when were out or in the car
customer_reviews.author: Trevan Biddulph

customer_reviews.title: GREAT battery and price
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I use it every day. Works with everything. When my Macbook or iPad are running it will maintain the current battery level not charge. Ohone it will charge while using
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: Does not charge as advertised
customer_reviews.text: It doesn’t do what it’s advertised to do. 15watts is not enough to power a MacBook. Might as well get a smaller, more portable sized one instead of this massive thing. It’ll probably do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Best PD portable charger
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best portable PD charger I could ask for, since my Pixel 3a only charges fast with PD chargers. It's also helpful with my nintendo switch when I don't have it's original charger around with me (though always use the original charger at all times).
customer_reviews.author: Luis Bravo

customer_reviews.title: The best batter bank I've owned. Gave as holiday gifts to my team.
customer_reviews.text: I love the versatility of this battery bank. Very easy to travel with. Charging my phone for a day of travel never takes more than 25% of this bank. Enough power for my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: Janna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent!
customer_reviews.text: This portable battery is fantastic. I had a different brand before and this one is much better. It charges faster and more times in one charge. It has multiple ports so it can charge more than one device at a time. The battery has a felt like texture to it that seems like a high quality. Get this if you travel or even to just use on the couch when your phone dies.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Strickland

customer_reviews.title: Huge Power bank will not disappoint you
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the biggest power bank I own. On a weekend trip I was able to recharge, iphone 11 pro (3 times) , Fitbit , Bose wireless headphones, Sony A7 and iPad with some capacity still remaining. It also has wide range of ports. Cons: Little over-weight ( cannot carry in jeans pocket )
customer_reviews.author: Harsh

customer_reviews.title: Great portable battery for MacBook Air
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my MacBook Air and my iPad Pro. So far it is holding a charge for a long time and can charge two devices at once. I usually charge the MacBook alone as I figure it will not charge that alongside another device.
customer_reviews.author: Leyna Pelli

customer_reviews.title: Power Bank
customer_reviews.text: It has a lot of battery storage, I can usually get three full charges out of it. It doesn’t have a charger plug for the wall, you use your phone charger, but that’s one less cable for me to worry about. It comes with a nice mesh case for the battery and the cords; easy to take on trips.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Trusted power bank
customer_reviews.text: I have had luck with very few battery banks and this is one if them. So far the battery life and quality is pretty good. It can support some heavy devices.
customer_reviews.author: Jackie

customer_reviews.title: High Quality
customer_reviews.text: Well packed power bank. High quality. Charging quickly and last longer than I expected. Very satisfied by far. Way better than $10 compact power banks I bought before. Worth the money. Slightly heavy, but I think that is normal for a high quality power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Hao

customer_reviews.title: Great with Pixel 3
customer_reviews.text: I've been using with my Pixel 3 and its amazing! Its thin/light perfect for travel, has all the connections you would want, charges my phone multiple times per charge, and somehow charges it faster than the stock charger!
customer_reviews.author: Eloy

customer_reviews.title: Compact long life battery power at you fingertips
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this on the basis of the reviews. They were right! Took a while to charge up and my charger got hot doing it. My iPhone battery life is poor so the main reason was to keep it topped up. On one charge I’ve had 3 weeks out of it and not empty yet. It is a nice compact size but quite heavy if you are very luggage weight conscious and use hand baggage only. In summary a neat compact power bank with excellent battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Saifar Nisar

customer_reviews.title: Great for charging multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: Great charger for traveling. I used to pack multiple charges when traveling but now I can charge multiple devices at the same time with this. It’s a sleek design and can easily be added to any bag. I highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: The Xanders

customer_reviews.title: Great for the road warrior
customer_reviews.text: Wasn’t expecting such a huge battery pack. This thing charged my laptop and phone while on the road. If you’re a road warrior and need a good pack To charge while on the road get this one!
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Campana

customer_reviews.title: Buy It
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic Power Supply, nice and thin and lite, gives a great charge and lasts a while before needing recharging
customer_reviews.author: Stephen B

customer_reviews.title: Great for concert junkies
customer_reviews.text: Pretty heavy, but I LOVE it! I attend lots of concerts and record a lot. My phone ALWAYS dies. Now that I have this, I carry it in a fanny pack across my chest and have power for the whole concert. Even when I am constantly recording, the battery level continues to increase. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darren

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing product with limited function
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a long trip in China where I would need power for several devices. Very disappointing. USB A ports appear to shut off randomly. Multiple smaller devices (kindle, earbuds, etc.) after being plugged in overnight were powered less than 50% yet the battery is still showing a charge. Unplugging the devices and plugging in again would re-initiate charging. USB C does not appear to work at all for devices larger than 18W. Provides no power at all to partially re-charge ultrabook, etc. batteries.
customer_reviews.author: David K.

customer_reviews.title: Not too bad for a spare.
customer_reviews.text: Charging is little slow. Could not get long output for MacBook. Little heavy and big for traveling.
customer_reviews.author: lmdgeneral

customer_reviews.title: It works perfect and has multiple ports for charging
customer_reviews.text: It works perfectly, has multiple ports to help charging multiple devices at once, liked it.
customer_reviews.author: YogeshPatel26

customer_reviews.title: Convenient!
customer_reviews.text: A convenient product for anyone that is traveling often or for when you are on the go! Love that my phone can always stay charged at all times! Comes with cables for both iPhone and Android phones and is packaged in a very nice way!
customer_reviews.author: Sana

customer_reviews.title: Amazing device for charging your laptop, phone, ipad!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far one of the best electronics that I have bought. It has a massive charge and is able to fast charge several devices at the same time. I never remove it from my backpack since it has been an absolute life saver! I would highly recommend this product since multiple cables are included and the finish material on it is a non-slip polymer.
customer_reviews.author: Berb

customer_reviews.title: Slim
customer_reviews.text: It is the same thickness as my phone(iPhone school max) and slightly bigger, comes with a nice bag that you can throw the battery and a wire or two in, the only thing I don’t like is the outside material, it is good quality but it will get dirty with finger prints, etc if that doesn’t bother you, I would recommend
customer_reviews.author: Spencer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but durable
customer_reviews.text: The battery pack is heave duty. It keeps my laptop charged, however, it does not continually charge my MacBook. It keeps the percentage and the percentage doesn’t decrease. It’s a nice size. However it’s a tad heave to put in a purse. I would recommend it for charging standard electronics.
customer_reviews.author: Vivian S.

customer_reviews.title: Good power bank
customer_reviews.text: I use it to charge my s10e and surface go for work. Charges both perfectly. It's a little bigger than I thought it would be, but it's slim enough that's it no a problem in my bag. Love the matte texture. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Power!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just recently received this product, initial thoughts it is big however still is pretty lightweight for its size. It comes with a very nice mesh case to protect the product. Holds a quite bit of a charge and can charge multiple products. So far its held up for a couple of days and it is great to take on long trips without having to plug your phone into the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Micalob Tri

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this power bank
customer_reviews.text: Bought this power bank to have on hand when we travel. I used it for charging 3 different cell phones, very easy and i am loving how much power it has.
customer_reviews.author: Kay E.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Product
customer_reviews.text: It seemed smaller in the pictures in which it was advertised, but it's not very huge or anything. The capacity is excellent. I charged three phones with it at once and I even use it more than my wall charger now when I'm in bed and want more mobility. The fast charge works well. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: C.H

customer_reviews.title: Really great charger! Very massive
customer_reviews.text: The battery is as great as expected. It's very massive, alot bigger than expected but very slim. It has a nice touch to it. However the reason I am not giving it 4 is because I'm a bit disappointed that the output that is supposed to be the QC 3.0 does not give my phone a fast charge like I had anticipated it to. It's still a really great charger and don't regret buying it.
customer_reviews.author: cesar rivangel

customer_reviews.title: Long battery life
customer_reviews.text: Battery holds long, so it will be possible to charge two devices at once and it wont take long.. easy to carry around in bag or pocket, so im quite happy about this purchase. Wanted one for a while, it’s actually very useful when you dint have time to wait fir your phone charge and try to find a plug wherever you go.. everyone should have one.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren Curtin

customer_reviews.title: Great portable charger!
customer_reviews.text: I constantly am running out of battery on my phone and outlets can be difficult to find--I've meant to get a power bank for ages and I'm so happy with this one! It came with a nice carrying case and multiple cables which is always a huge help. It charges multiple devices quickly, definitely worth the investment
customer_reviews.author: Corrine

customer_reviews.title: Great battery!
customer_reviews.text: I have been looking for a good battery for traveling for a while. Although I haven’t really used for traveling yet I have used it in my hikes. It is able to charge my phone and ear buds together. I haven’t noticed the battery life but it’s because I always have charge on the battery.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My review
customer_reviews.text: Charges my phone at work for 4 days on one charge I love it
customer_reviews.author: Kareem Lutchman

customer_reviews.title: Must have!
customer_reviews.text: I was honestly surprised how powerful it is. Very useful to keep it in your purse, charges really quick and lasts forever. Sleek design and great quality. Great present for Father’s Day :)
customer_reviews.author: Daria

customer_reviews.title: Pretty sleek look
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my daughters iPad and our phones always die while we are out. It’s easy to store and use. You can plug in 3 things although it came with a little piece that was confusing. But you can also use your own chargers !
customer_reviews.author: Breanna

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: This is hands down the best portable power bank I have ever owned. Battery able to charge multiple devices at the same time, more than once. amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent International Travel Companion
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a trip recently overseas and not only does it recharge my iPad, iPhone 6s, and Nintendo Switch multiple times I loved the fact that I could charge the device with either Lightning or microUSB. Being an iPhone user I normally have a lightning cable more readily available while traveling and it worked perfectly. I love the thin form factor compared to my older bulky power bank.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: This is the ONLY power bank you need!!
customer_reviews.text: I have an iphone 11 pro max and i usually keep this in my gym bag. I love that it holds so much juice, so I’d only charge it about once a week. I use a usb c to lighting charger to get the fast charging and it charges just as fast as the wall outlet.
customer_reviews.author: LALaker

customer_reviews.title: Great pack with multiple charging options
customer_reviews.text: This battery pack has been great for traveling, I don’t have to worry about finding an outlet because it will charge my phone for almost a week
customer_reviews.author: kabel gebeke

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Great so far! I have been using this a month or so and it has completely met my expectations. It charges my MacBook Pro without issues and it’s handy to carry in its own drawstring bag. Had plenty of ports for my needs on a trip last week. 👍
customer_reviews.author: Sarahjo80

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing product, I’m so excited, it has an elegant design and the battery life is amazing, simply I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin

customer_reviews.title: must have
customer_reviews.text: Use the charger everywhere, even at home. Last forever, wife was mad I didn't buy her one. Charge almost anything.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Perkins

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: The product works well. Plenty of ports to plug everything into. It charges my phone's rapidly which is why I purchased it. So I'm happy with it. Too big to fit in your pocket though.
customer_reviews.author: Cali

customer_reviews.title: Hold a great charge
customer_reviews.text: We bought 2 of these my grandson uses his with his ipad
customer_reviews.author: Allison Cole

customer_reviews.title: Works great when charge, but the carrying bag it's not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, but the save bag it's not comfortable when you have to carry in hand and walk, I suggest that set some clips or something to stock the open bag.
customer_reviews.author: Darlin C.

customer_reviews.title: Quick charge BAD!
customer_reviews.text: The quick charge USB port does not have THAT quick charge for phones as it says. Also, I made a replacement because the battery did not fully charge.
customer_reviews.author: Milton

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic battery, almost perfect...
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product, I have been able to run my Chromebook for 2 whole days on one charge and still had some to spare. Would be 5 star from me (even after almost 6 months) if the usb-c to usb-c cable that came with it (the most useful one) had not split and stopped working.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: fast charging ports
customer_reviews.text: Love it has plenty of power and charges very fast
customer_reviews.author: Anthony B

customer_reviews.title: Works really good with other devices
customer_reviews.text: I use this for an HTC vive wireless adapter since I could only use my headset for about 3 hours before the battery died. With this battery it lasts well over 8 hours which is way better then I ever expected.
customer_reviews.author: Garrett Holtz

customer_reviews.title: High quality external battery
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charmast to charge my cellphone and my son's tablet while we are away from home and have a long travel that will help so much as we are 3 so we can charge all at once, love the design and so satisfied with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Maya

customer_reviews.title: Worked well at first.
customer_reviews.text: Worked well for my overseas trip but start losing battery halfway and just dying. Mine may just be a lemon though. The other reviews don't reflect my ailment.
customer_reviews.author: WabbityAsian

customer_reviews.title: Great power bank with ports for everything
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this after my last large capacity power bank died. Worked exactly as expected including fast charging from both the USC-C and QC3.0 ports. Will order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Number one choice for power banks!
customer_reviews.text: This product is amazing!Well worth the buy- the battery life on it is very very good and the speed it charges is quicker than being plugged in at the wall i think!Amazing product Charmast 5*
customer_reviews.author: James Mahon

customer_reviews.title: Best Battery Pack Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I took this on a day trip charged my phone and 2 others and then used it for another two days before it needed to be recharged! My only complaint is no USB c to USB c for recharging the battery pack but it’s awesome that you can recharge via Apple’s lightening cable.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan

customer_reviews.title: Ability to charge any device
customer_reviews.text: It comes with different type of charging cables - I can charge iPhone, Android phones, Window phones. I can charge laptop too though not enough but good to keep using laptop in case of urgent need.
customer_reviews.author: Praveen Kumar

customer_reviews.title: Great battery pack and great customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This is my second go around with this product. The first one failed after about 8 months of solid use. It’s great for traveling and the customer service to get a replacement was very helpful. I’d recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Travis Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: This is a lifesaving product fir any traveller.My phones battery always become dead while i am travelling so i wanted a good power bank. This is worth purchasing
customer_reviews.author: Troy Lowry

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size and mAh
customer_reviews.text: Very good looking and working charger ,if i will need it another one i will buy this one for sure ,Thanks
customer_reviews.author: DariuszM.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable charger
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product last a long time charge many devices no issues
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: Fast charger
customer_reviews.text: This product is very convenient, works very well , also bought one for my wife who travels to the hospital to receive breast cancer treatment , it’s also very convenient for her . Fast charge is awesome ! Great product.
customer_reviews.author: tommy

customer_reviews.title: Reliable
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for comic con, haven’t ever drained the battery yet.
customer_reviews.author: JL

customer_reviews.title: Great Powerbank, Great Price!
customer_reviews.text: I've got multiple phone charges without having to recharge the bank and its FAST charging too. Looking to buy another soon.
customer_reviews.author: Eddie Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product. Terrible customer service.
customer_reviews.text: This charger lasted about 45 days before it would not take a charge. Despite numerous efforts to have it replaced I received no response from customer service. So now it is an expensive paperweight.
customer_reviews.author: Terry D. Thom

customer_reviews.title: Charmast Power Bank
customer_reviews.text: This is a well operating product, and it is quite thin and handles a large storage load. Good for travel.
customer_reviews.author: Burreetoman

customer_reviews.title: important purchase
customer_reviews.text: This is soooo good, long long life, easy to use and charge. Does it's job very well.

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for traveling. It's well made and the battery lasts a long time.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: Used it to re charge my iPad pro. Working beautifully..

customer_reviews.title: Monster of monsters!!! Great product
customer_reviews.text: Monster power bank, works amazing, more than happy, great Customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Abel Eduardo Gomez

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product. It’s perfect for charging my iPhone and my post 2016 MacBook. Fits well in my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey McFalls

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great value.
customer_reviews.text: This product works great, and is a really good value.
customer_reviews.author: tyson white

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product.
customer_reviews.text: The product works excellent. It's thin and light weight and so far works just as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Luis Zapien

customer_reviews.title: A MUST HAVE!! Get you one!!!
customer_reviews.text: I just love this thing!!! Sleek & stylish that hold a lot of power!
customer_reviews.author: Marcellus G.

customer_reviews.title: Last a long time and perfect for travel
customer_reviews.text: Buy this charging portable power bank! It has the USB c compatibility that other power banks don’t. It definitely is an upgraded feature compared to other power banks and the times of technology is changing. This is just as good as any power bank and holds a long charge for my liking. 3 usb connections that has variable charging output. Small thing I don’t like about the product is the texture of the outside that doesn’t seem to last long overtime, but other that it does it’s job and is worth it for the price of a long and durable battery.
customer_reviews.author: Amy Chan

customer_reviews.title: These things are great
customer_reviews.text: I love the slim profile. The battery fits in pockets and narrow compartments so it's easy to take on the road, especially for the size of the battery. I love that it's flat and not a brick. I bought one two years ago and I gave it to my daughter when she needed one for a trip. Missed it so much I bought another for myself. I take it pretty much everywhere. It takes a beating and always holds a charge.
customer_reviews.author: cagray51

product_meta.title: Power Delivery Power Bank 26800mAh, PD Power Bank, Charmast 18W USB C Portable Charger Quick Charge 3.0 Battery Pack Compatible with Switch Nintendo,MacBook/New Type-C MacBook Air/iPad Pro iPhone more
feature_bullets: ⚡【18W Power Delivery USB-C Port】: Type-C port with PD protocol provides 9-12V high voltage output, compatible with your MacBook/ new Type-C iPad Pro/ new 13" MacBook Air with Retina display. The USB-C port is versatile, also compatible with QC 3.0 protocol that means it will charge your compatible devices with the optimal charging speed For example, Boost up 50% battery to your iPhone X/ 8/ 8 Plus in 30 minutes. (USB-C to Lightning cable is not included)

⚡【High-speed Charging】: Full recharging battery 7 hours by QC/PD 3.0 charger; It has two standard USB ports, a Quick Charge port and a USB-C port that allows you to charge multiple devices simultaneously, these ports will detect devices and set them for optimal charging settings. Quick Charge 3.0 port charges compatible devices up to 80% in 35 minutes, providing 5V 9V 12V voltage intelligently adjustable charging for different QC 3.0 devices, 4 times faster than conventional charging

⚡【26800mAh High Capacity, Powerful Compatibility】: Charmast power bank compatible with Switch Nintendo, iPhone Xs/XR/X/8, Google Pixel, Samsung Galaxy, Sony, Blackberry, HTC series and etc. USB-C cell phones. With its 26800mAh capacity, it compatible with iPhone 8 7 times, Galaxy S8 5 times, ipad mini 3 times, 2017/ 2016 Macbook and tablets at least 2 times, notebook at least once, that's enough power to last an entire trip

⚡【Easy to Carry】 Ultra slim and compact body with only 14mm thickness, fully rubber oil surface cover, smooth design let you enjoy a good touch feeling and protect your devices from scratched or dropped, great for traveling

⚡【Safe and Reliable】 UL 2056, CE, RoHS, FCC certified manufacturing quality. Built-in intelligent safeguards protect your devices against excessive current flow, overheating and overcharging, more safe to use; 12 month Support Service
